programme.title: Yugi se prepara para a batalha suprema contra Pegasus, com as almas de seu av, Kaiba e Mokuba em jogo. No meio-tempo, Tristan e Bakura se infiltram no castelo para encontrar os irmos Kaiba, mas ser que Bakura est voltando ao seu eu maligno de novo?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Partida do Milnio, Parte 1

programme.title: Pegasus tambm pune Yugi com seu deck Toon e habilidade de ler mentes. Ao passo que Pegasus faz os monstros de Yugi se virarem contra ele, Yugi perde a determinao de batalhar. Ser que Pegasus prender a alma de Yugi em uma carta, assim como com Kaiba?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Partida do Milnio, Parte 2

programme.title: Yugi descobriu como escapar da habilidade de Pegasus de ler mentes: Yugi alterna entre suas duas almas! Yugi consegue destruir o Mundo Toon de Pegasus, mas o duelo s comeou. O prximo nvel do mortal Jogo da Sombra est prestes a comear!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Partida do Milnio, Parte 3

programme.title: Yugi esmorece de cansao sob o poder do devastador Jogo da Sombra. Seus amigos gritam incentivos desesperados, mas suas vozes no conseguem penetrar a esfera de escurido. A chance de vitria de Yugi est esvaecendo, e sua vida tambm.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Partida do Milnio, Parte 4

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Partida do Milnio, Parte 5

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi e seus amigos retornam do Reino dos Duelistas e conhecem uma jovem chamada Rebecca, que exige que o av de Yugi lhe devolva o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis! Ela veio reivindicar a carta que o av de Yugi roubou do av dela muitos anos atrs!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Rebecca est enganada em acreditar que o av de Yugi roubou o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis do av dela. Yugi precisa defender o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis para ensinar a ela que o que conta no o poder das cartas, mas o corao delas.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: A junta de diretores desonestos da KaibaCorp prende Kaiba dentro de um jogo de realidade virtual! Mokuba recruta Yugi e Joey para libertar Kaiba desse jogo sem igual, no qual perder equivale a morrer!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: A misso para resgatar Kaiba continua com uma ajudinha de... Mai? Mas ser que Yugi e seus amigos se adaptaro a um mundo virtual em que as regras e estratgias mudam a toda hora?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi e seus amigos resgatam Kaiba, mas ainda esto presos no jogo! A nica sada requer enfrentar o Drago de Cinco Cabeas, mas Joey, Mokuba e Mai perdem todos os seus pontos de vida no difcil duelo!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Um novo aluno, Duke Devlin, derrota Joey em um jogo de Duel Monsters, forando Joey a ser seu servo. Duke fora Joey a usar um uniforme de cachorro e o humilha em pblico, forando Yugi a desafiar Duke para um duelo.

programme.title: Lute Por Sua Vida, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Um filme focado em um grupo de pessoas obcecadas por um livro de autoajuda. medida que o livro se torna mais popular, ele afeta uma estranha variedade de personagens. Suas vidas se cruzam, gerando mudanas que duraro para sempre.

programme.title: Xeque-Mate, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Um caso de identidade equivocada coloca Slevin no meio de uma guerra sendo tramada por dois dos chefes do crime mais rivais da cidade. Sob vigilncia constante do detetive Brikowski e do assassino Goodkat, ele deve peg-los antes que eles o peguem.

programme.title: Memria Artificial, (2008, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma mulher que sofre de amnsia condenada morte sem se lembrar do crime que cometeu. O FBI oferece uma segunda chance se voc se submeter a um experimento: implante as memrias de fatalidades para resolver crimes.

programme.title: Assassino em Srie, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Um psiclogo criminal e um especialista em impresses digitais trabalham juntos para rastrear um assassino em srie.

programme.title: Sem Lei, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Um grupo de trs amigos planeja um grande roubo que acaba dando errado quando um deles se revela um traidor. Enganado, Sonny decide assumir o problema de frente e busca vingana contra o antigo parceiro.

programme.title: Instinto Selvagem 2, (2006, Crime)
programme.desc: A romancista Catherine est novamente em apuros com a lei e a Scotland Yard nomeia o psiquiatra Dr. Michael Glass para avali-la. No entanto, como o detetive Nick Curran antes dele, Glass fica fascinado por Tramell e atrado para um jogo sedutor.

programme.title: Um Negcio de Risco, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Quatro amigos renem-se no funeral de um ex-colega de turma. Entre uma conversa e outra, um deles menciona uma informao privilegiada que tem sobre uma ao na bolsa valores, e que com certeza ir gerar lucro, deixando-os milionrios.

programme.title: November Man: Um Espio Nunca Morre, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Peter Devereaux um agente da CIA que se afasta do ramo da espionagem, mas trazido de volta depois de cinco anos quando enviado para uma tarefa fora dos trmites oficiais da CIA, mas percebe que h bem mais interesses por trs desta situao

programme.title: Ruslan-Vingana Explosiva, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: Ruslan Drachev um ex-gangster que agora escreve romances criminais baseados em suas experincias. Ao visitar sua famlia ele descobre que sua filha est casando com o filho de um arqui-inimigo do mundo do crime.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Kazekage Se Mantm No Alto
programme.desc: Naruto e sakura derrotam kakashi no desafio de sobrevivncia. Tsunade os nomeia como uma equipe de trs liderados por kakashi, e diz que agora eles so todos iguais.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Misso Cumprida
programme.desc: Para proteger sua aldeia da argila explosiva de deidara, gaara usa seu chakra para criar um escudo de areia gigante.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Corra Kankuro
programme.desc: Gaara, totalmente sem foras, arrastado paralonge por deidara. Kankuro ignora esforos de baki de parar deidara e sai imediatamente em perseguio com um peloto para salvar gaara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Equipe Kakashi Se Mobiliza
programme.desc: A caminho da aldeia da areia, temari encontra kakashi e sua equipe. Kakashi chama naruto quando ele tenta seguir adiante e naruto explode sua raiva pelos akatsuki.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Lagrimas Do Jinchuriki
programme.desc: Uma mensagem urgente da aldeia da areia informando o sequestro do kazekage pelos akatsuki chega aldeia da folha. Tsunade no perde tempo em mandar a equipe kakashi para a aldeia da areia. Enquanto isso, kankuro comea a sua batalha contra os akatsuki.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Jutsu De Selamento: Nove Drages Fantasmas!
programme.desc: Os ninjas da areia lutam contra o tempo para salvar kankuro,at queumaperitaem veneno da areia, vov chiyo chamada.a nica esperana est nos reforos enviados por tsunade. Mas naruto, sakura e kakashi so atrasados por uma tempestade de areia.
programme.sub-title: Jutsu De Selamento: Nove Drages Fantasmas!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Aprendiz De Mdica Ninja
programme.desc: Sakura trata kankuro que est gravemente enfermo. Aps um extenso treinamento, Sakura se tornou um incrvel mdica ninja e deixa todos espantados com suas mos firmes.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Determinao Da Vov Aposentada
programme.desc: Pakkun acha o esconderijo dos akatsuki. A equipe kakashi e temari se preparam para resgatar, mas temari recebe ordens para ficar e ajudar a proteger a aldeia. Vov chiyo se oferece para tomar o lugar de temari.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Encontro Com Destino
programme.desc: A equipe kakashi encontra itachi uchiha, de quem sofrera uma amarga derrota no passado. Kakashi diz a todos para no olharem nos olhos sharingan de itachi. Kakashi se prepara para enfrentar itachi sozinho e pede que naruto d cobertura.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Crescimento De Naruto
programme.desc: Guy lamenta sua asneira ao ver seus trs alunos presos pela priso de gua.determinado a parar kisame, guy o desafia usando o nunchaku, sua arma favorita. um super taijutsu contra uma super fora humana.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Esfera Secreta De Chama
programme.desc: Vov chiyo e sakura salvam naruto do genjutsu de itachi.no mesmo instante, kakashi comea um contra-ataque. Uma batalha ninja de nvel alto comea e kakashi exibe toda sua destreza e percio usando uma ttica sutil.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Segredo Do Jinchurik!
programme.desc: Seus inimigos derrotados, kisame e itachi, parecem ter sido clones, cujos poderes e aparecimento foram copiados por um jutsu de personificao.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Morte Do Gaara
programme.desc: As equipes kakashi e guy fazem uma pausa.vov chiyo observa naruto cochilar e lembra de sasori quando criana.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Postura Ttica: Operao Entrada Em Gancho!
programme.desc: As equipe kakashi e guy chegam ao esconderijo dos akatsuki. Eles correm para se infiltrar mas so parados por uma barreira de cinco selos. O nico jeito de quebrar a barreira removendo os cinco selos de uma s vez.
programme.sub-title: Postura Ttica: Operao Entrada Em Gancho!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Armadilhas Ativadas ... Os Inimigos Da Equipe Guy!
programme.desc: Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e agora a equipe guy enfrentam cpias idnticas de si mesmos numa batalha.no esconderijo dos akatsuki, deidara e sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki de nove caudas.
programme.sub-title: Armadilhas Ativadas ... Os Inimigos Da Equipe Guy!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Hiruko Contra Duas Kunoichi!
programme.desc: Finalmente a luta entre av e neto comea. Sakura fica confusa com a aparncia estranha de sasori, e vov chiyo explica que aquele hiruko, o corpo que sasori usa para autodefesa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Verdadeiro Rosto De Sasori
programme.desc: Vovchiyo e sakura conseguem expor sasori, que incrivelmente no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos.chiyo fica ainda mais chocada com o segundo boneco que sasori revela.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Habilidades Secretas De Chiyo
programme.desc: Sakura pega pelas tticas de sasori e fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno. Mas ela usa uma papel bomba para se livrar da fumaavenenosa. Ela resolver se arriscar a capturar sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre o paradeiro de orochimaru.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pai E Me
programme.desc: A maior vantagem dos bonecos criados de humanos que ele pode assumir o comando do jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo.consequentemente, o boneco do terceiro kazekage tem ahabilidade especial de converter chakra em poder magntico.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Terceiro Kazekage
programme.desc: Sakura revida oataque da areia de ferro do boneco do terceiro kazekage com uma fora sobre-humana. Ela aprendeu com tsunade que a habilidade mais importante de um mdico ninja se evadir um ataque.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Trs Minutos Entre A Vida E A Morte
programme.desc: Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto secreto que ela tomou. Sakura explica a uma surpresa vov chiyo que esse antdoto converte o veneno em protena e funciona durante mais ou menos trs minutos.
programme.sub-title: Trs Minutos Entre A Vida E A Morte

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Luta Entre Marionetes: Dez Contra Cem!
programme.desc: Sakura e vov chiyo esto enfrentando uma batalha feroz contra sasori, onde ele pode se tornar um boneco humano. Elas derrotam sasori dentro do prazo, mas ele acaba revivendo.
programme.sub-title: Luta Entre Marionetes: Dez Contra Cem!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Sonho Impossvel
programme.desc: Embora tenha sido envenenada, vov chiyo usa o ltimoantdoto em sakura. Zombando da terna cena entre vov chiyo e sakura, sasori tenta por fim vida de vov chiyo. Mas vov chiyo revida e derrota sasori.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Feras Ressuscitadas!
programme.desc: Os ninjas da equipe guy se preocupam com o resultado da luta desesperada de sakura e vov chiyo, enquanto enfrentam suas cpias.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Kakashi Iluminado
programme.desc: Sakura corre para achar naruto com a vov chiyo, que est sofrendo com o veneno. Os membros da equipe guy correm paraajudar a equipe kakashi. Enquanto isso, com as preparaes completas, kakashi revela seu mangekyo sharingan.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Esttica De Um Momento
programme.desc: Na Aldeia da Folha, a equipe de Konohamaru foi promovida a Genin e agora est sob a superviso de Ebisu. Um Naruto mais velho chega aldeia aps uma longa jornada de treinamento com Jiraiya. Naruto Uzumaki est de volta!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Legado
programme.desc: Jiraiya traz notcias altamente secretas de que os Akatsuki entraram em ao. Naruto e Sakura propem a Kakashi um desafio de sobrevivncia. Na Aldeia da Areia, Gaara o Kazekage agora, e membros da Akatsuki se infiltram na aldeia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Volta Do Kazekage
programme.desc: As habilidades de Naruto e Sakura foram Kakashi a usar seu sharingan imediatamente. Naruto lana um jutsu aps outro. Sakura usa tcnicas ensinadas a ela por Tsunade. Deidara da Akatsuki comea uma operao secreta para se infiltrar na Aldeia da Areia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Alvo
programme.desc: Gaara percebe a presena de Deidara e comea uma batalha area na areia. O jonin da areia Yura, um agente da Akatsuki, e a Aldeia da Areia sofre danos. Na Aldeia da Folha, Naruto e Sakura veem o incrvel poder de Kakashi. A dupla d seu golpe final.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Formao! A Nova Equipe Kakashi
programme.desc: Naruto e Sakura derrotam Kakashi. Tsunade os nomeia como uma equipe de trs liderados por Kakashi, dizendo que agora so todos iguais. Gaara e Deidara continuam sua batalha. Baki fica preocupado que o shukaku se materialize, mas Kankuro ri da ideia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Adio Indesejada
programme.desc: Para proteger sua aldeia da argila explosiva de Deidara, Gaara usa seu chakra para criar um escudo. A aldeia salva a um enorme custo. Gaara fica vulnervel. As tentativas de seus companheiros so inteis, e Gaara acaba caindo nas mos de Deidara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Falso Sorriso
programme.desc: Gaara arrastado para longe por Deidara. Kankuro sai com um peloto para salvar Gaara, mas os Akatsuki haviam instalado armadilhas engenhosas. Determinado, Kankuro encontra sozinho os Akatsuki. A nova equipe de Naruto comemora sua primeira misso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sem Ttulo
programme.desc: Temari encontra Kakashi e sua equipe. Naruto explode de raiva pelos Akatsuki. Como tambm hospeda uma besta de cauda dentro de si, Naruto entende o que Gaara est sofrendo. Kankuro infectado por um veneno. Sem um antdoto, ele ter poucos dias de vida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Simulao
programme.desc: Chega uma mensagem da Aldeia da Areia sobre o sequestro do Kazekage. Tsunade manda a equipe Kakashi para a aldeia. Kankuro comea a batalha contra os Akatsuki, mas as tticas dos bonecos no funcionam. Seu oponente foi quem desenvolveu essas tticas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Ponte Tenchi

programme.desc: A classic cult film that features one of the screen's most unlikely pairs. It will defy everything you've ever seen or known about screen lovers.

programme.desc: Dustin Hoffman magnificently captures the complexities and contradictions of the legendary comedian Lenny Bruce's mercurial character.

programme.desc: Henry Graham, a confirmed bachelor with a zest for luxuries, receives the shocking news that he is now broke. Henrys spirits are low as he returns to his town-house to discuss the situation with his butler, Harold who suggests marriage as a way out.

programme.title: Cold Turkey, (1971, Political Comedies)
programme.desc: Dick Van Dyke stars as Clayton Brooks, minister in a small Iowa town, who takes up the challenge presented by an ad exec (Bob Newhart) for a tobacco company: any city or town in America that can give up smoking for 30 days gets $25 million dollars.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bandit Keith's gang kidnaps Joey to a secret cave with a graveyard playing field. As Yugi and friends search for him, Joey faces Bandit Keith's zombie monsters which become stronger as they return from the grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey's last-ditch effort, his lucky Time Wizard card, fails against Bandit Keith's zombie monsters. But as his lucky streak comes to an end, will his improving skills as a duelist and his love for his sister inspire him to victory?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey band together in a team battle against the Paradox Brothers with all the Star Chips and entrance to Pegasus's castle on the line!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Paradox Brothers summon the almighty Gate Guardian, a monster that reflects all attacks! Is Joey helping Yugi in this duel, or is his lack of experience sealing their fate for defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, the Summoned Skull, and the Red-Eyes Black Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of the Gate Guardian.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In order to earn the right to challenge Pegasus, Kaiba must first beat Yugi and take his Star Chips. The rematch between Yugi and Kaiba is about to begin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, the strongest monster in the game fused from three Blue-Eyes White Dragons! Yugi has lost all his powerful Duel Monsters, but a true duelist never gives up!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi begins spinning a strategy to put the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon to rest, but he must decide whether to claim victory or spare Kaiba his life. Yugi's heart is split in two!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost his star chips to Kaiba and his only opportunity to save Grandpa, Yugi is in a state of shock. Can Tea bring Yugi back to consciousness by defeating Mai for her extra star chips and teach Yugi the heart of the duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends enter the castle to discover Kaiba ready to duel Pegasus with Mokuba's soul hanging in the balance! The power of the Millennium Eye gives Pegasus the ability to read other people's minds.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba is helpless against Pegasus's Toon World deck and mind-reading abilities. As the duel ends, Pegasus imprisons Kaiba's soul into a card, just like Grandpa and Mokuba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi vows to overthrow Pegasus for the sake of his Grandpa. Tristan leads an exploration party to uncover Pegasus's secrets. While Joey sleeps, Bandit Keith steals from him the card that permits his entry in the final battle!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Under Pegasus's glare, Yugi is distracted from his duel with Mai. After making foolish errors and allowing Mai to gain a huge advantage with her Harpie's Pet Dragon, will Yugi gather his focus or succumb to the pressure?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has rebounded from her previous loss to Joey to become a better duelist. Has Yugi learned from his loss to Kaiba, or is the emotional defeat still weighing on his heart? The answer is in the cards!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey searches for the card that permits him to enter the final battle, not realizing Bandit Keith has stolen it. As he struggles to accept the fact that Serenity will be blind forever, he receives help from a new friend!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Bandit Keith's Machine deck forces Joey to take the defensive, Joey mimics Keith's battle strategy to metalize his Red-Eyes Black Dragon! Is victory assured, or does the cheater Bandit Keith literally have one last card up his sleeve?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey challenges Yugi for the right to face Pegasus. In a battle between friends, a fierce match ensues between the two people who know each other's strategies and cards.
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is shocked as Joey uses the Time Wizard card on him. It's the very same card Yugi gave Joey as a sign of friendship!
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi prepares for the ultimate battle against Pegasus with the souls of Grandpa, Kaiba, and Mokuba on the line.
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus punishes Yugi using the same Toon Deck and mind-reading abilities he used on Kaiba. As Pegasus turns Yugi's monsters against him, Yugi loses the will to battle. Will Pegasus capture Yugi's soul into a card, just like Kaiba?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has found a counter to Pegasus's mind-reading ability: Yugi switches back and forth between his two souls! Yugi is able to destroy Pegasus's Toon World, but the duel has just only begun. The next level of the deadly Shadow Game is about to start!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi crumples under the power of the Shadow Game. His friends yell desperate encouragement, but their voices cannot penetrate the sphere of darkness. Yugi's chance at victory is slipping away, as is his life!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 4

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus summons Relinquished, a fearsome monster that can consume Yugi's Duel Monsters! Yugi counters with Kuriboh?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 5

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi meets a mysterious Egyptian named Shadi who enters Yugi's mind with the Millennium Key. What are these Millennium Items, and do they hold the answer to the mystery behind the Shadow Games?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends return from the Duelist Kingdom only to meet a young girl named Rebecca who demands that Grandpa return Blue-Eyes White Dragon to her.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rebecca mistakenly believes that Grandpa stole the Blue-Eyes White Dragon from her grandfather. Yugi must defend the Blue-Eyes White Dragon to teach her that it's not the power of the cards, but the heart that's in them that counts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The two-faced Board of Directors of Kaiba Corporation trap Kaiba inside a virtual reality game. Mokuba recruits Yugi and Joey to free Kaiba from this ultimate game where losing equals death!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help from Mai? But can YUGI and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past a Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mailose all their life points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Duke Devlin defeats Joey and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel. However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey's freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi's position is helpless!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Duke's all-powerful Orogoth The Relentless dices Yugi's entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points!

programme.title: Luffy kicks into Second Gear for his rematch with Largo, and Nami leads the islanders as they lay waste to the Amigo Pirates. Boss the Beetle may be safe for now, but someone sinister lurks behind the scenes.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Special Presentation Related to the Movie/ The Battle is on! Luffy Vs. Largo

programme.title: Luffy struggles to stay a step ahead of a prison patrol made up of hungry lions and poisonous scorpions! Meanwhile, Ace spends what could be his final hours swapping stories with a pirate who hates pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Warlord in Prison Jimbei, The Honorable Pirate

programme.title: While the guards struggle to squelch a violent prison uprising, Luffy and his fellow fugitives try to keep their cool in a level of Impel Down known as Starvation Hell!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Trap of Chief Guard Saldeath - Level 3 Starvation Hell

programme.title: Boa Hancock uses her ample assets to buy some private time for a clandestine chat with Ace. Meanwhile, Luffy needs help from a graceful friend to escape the jaws of a hungry Sphinx!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Liberated Swan! Reunion! Bon Kurei

programme.title: Luffy and Bon are on the verge of reaching Level 4, but they didn't count on fighting a demonic, lightning-fast, devastatingly powerful Minotaur! To defeat this beast, they'll need help from a human candle and a deranged clown!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Chief Warden Magellan Moves - The Net to Trap Straw Hat Is Complete!

programme.title: Luffy narrowly avoids a deadly dip in the boiling pool of blood, only to find himself face to face with Warden Magellan. Meanwhile, outside the prison walls, the marine fleet prepares for Whitebeard's onslaught!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Preparations for War! A Decisive Battle in Level 4 - Blazing Hell

programme.title: Warden Magellan is a monster of a man with a penchant for poisoning prisoners. To rescue Ace, Luffy must go toe to toe with this toxic terror, but how do you defeat a foe who's deadly to the touch?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Magellan's Strength! Bon Kurei Flees Before His Enemy

programme.title: Luffy's daring assault on the venomous warden of Impel Down leaves him struggling to stand up, but despite the lethal poison breaking down his body, the rubber-man kicks his rescue mission into Second Gear!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SHOWDOWN HAS COME! LUFFY'S DESPERATE LAST ATTACK!

programme.title: While Luffy hovers perilously on the verge of death, Bon Clay embarks on a suicidal rescue mission plagued by sub-zero temperatures and bloodthirsty wolves with a supremely savage disposition!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FOR HIS FRIEND! BON CLAY'S DEADLY RESCUE ATTEMPT

programme.title: No existing antidote can save Luffy from the poison coursing through his veins, yet Bon Clay refuses to give up. His final, fleeting hope is a mysterious miracle-worker rumored to have vanished into the Gates of Hell!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A PARADISE IN HELL / IMPEL DOWN LEVEL 5.5

programme.title: Bon is overjoyed to hear that Luffy is still alive, but his happiness quickly turns to shock when he learns that Ivan's agonizingly painful "Healing Hormones" will cost the rubber-man ten years of his life!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY'S TREATMENT BEGINS / IVA'S MIRACULOUS POWER!

programme.title: Ace is scheduled to be executed in a matter of hours, and Luffy's still hovering on the verge of death. It will take a miracle to save them both, but Bon would rather die than give up on his friend!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BELIEVE IN MIRACLES! BON CLAY'S CRIES FROM THE HEART

programme.title: Luffy miraculously survived his brush with death, but he's far too weak to finish rescuing Ace. Ivan is reluctant to lend a hormonal hand to the doomed rescue mission until he learns of Luffy's lineage!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY BACK IN ACTION! IVA BEGINS THE BREAKOUT PLAN!!

programme.title: The quest to rescue Ace tuckers out thanks to a blast of sleeping gas! Ivan's scissor-handed sidekick puts an end to nap time, but Luffy will have to join forces with a scar-faced foe from the past if he wants to complete his mission!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ACE'S CONVOY BEGINS / BATTLE ON THE LOWEST FLOOR, LEVEL 6!

programme.title: Luffy's desperate attempt to rescue Ace is bolstered by two powerful new allies: the murderous Crocodile and the honorable fishman Jinbei. Meanwhile, Ivan sparks a prison riot to create a diversion for the rubber-man.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE ULTIMATE TEAM IS FORMED / SHAKING IMPEL DOWN!

programme.title: Luffy and his gang of outlaws cause a commotion on Level Four, Blackbeard's arrival leads to the release of the prison's most feared inmate, and Ace gazes upon the great blue sky for what could be the very last time!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EVEN MORE CHAOS! BLACKBEARD TEACH INVADES

programme.title: Luffy and his mates cross paths with a ragged gang of sailors. The Straw Hats are quick to offer assistance, but their new friends may be up to no good!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Mysterious Band of Pirates! Sunny and the Dangerous Trap!

programme.title: The Straw Hats discover that their fishermen friends are actually pirates, but Chopper refuses to abandon a very sick patient.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sunny in a Pinch! Roar, Secret Superspeed Mecha!

programme.title: The captain of the Phoenix Pirates loses his will to fight, and the Straw Hats get trapped in a field of icebergs by some figure skating bounty hunters!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Dream Sinking in the New World! The Disillusioned Pirate, Puzzle!

programme.title: Nami and Franky take a spin in the shark sub, Usopp and Sanji have a run in with a flock of deadly penguins, and Puzzle can no longer hide the fact that he's alive!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Assassins Attack! The Great Battle on Ice Begins!

programme.title: Robin is shocked by her encounter with an adorable bounty hunter, Franky and Nami get trapped in a frozen shark, and Luffy's quest to recapture his flag sends him sinking toward the bottom of the sea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Staw Hats Hard Battles! A Pirate Soul Risking It All for the Flag!

programme.title: Luffy battles a set of magnetic twins, Sanji and Usopp fall victim to a pair of figure skating lovebirds, and Zoro has a drink with the man who stole the Straw Hat flag!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Hot Full Throttle! The Twins Magnetic Power Drawing Near!

programme.title: Robin's cola care package helps spring her friends from an icy prison, and Luffy's bold words inspire a battered and beaten pirate to keep fighting!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Mansion of Great Chaos! The Enraged Don and the Captured Crew!

programme.title: While Luffy continues his battle with the magnetic twins, Chopper uses a rumble ball in his battle with a hockey player and Robin tries to recover the Straw Hat flag!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Return of the Phoenix! The Dream of the Pirate Flag Sworn to a Friend!

programme.title: Luffy battles an opponent who's too hot to handle, Robin gets attacked by a jungle, and Chopper makes a heroic dash for the Straw Hat flag!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Red Hot Decisive Battle! Luffy vs. The Scorching Don!

programme.title: Luffy's red-hot battle with Papa threatens to destroy the entire icy island, and the rest of the Straw Hats need a little help from a former enemy to recover their flag!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Waiting in the New World! Farewell to the Brave Pirates!

programme.title: The most adorable hero the world has ever known Chopperman must battle a hideously evil villain to regain control of his favorite television station!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Chopperman to the Rescue! Protect the TV Station by the Shore!

programme.title: While sailing through haunted waters, the Straw Hats encounter a ghost ship that's home to a walking, talking skeleton!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE MYSTERIOUS SKELETON FLOATING THROUGH THE FOG! VENTURE INTO THE DEVIL'S SEA!

programme.title: The Straw Hats attempt to unravel the mystery of their new comrade, but the skeleton's sad story is interrupted by a ghastly landing at the haunted island of Thriller Bark!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE JOY OF SEEING PEOPLE! THE GENTLEMAN SKELETON'S TRUE IDENTITY!

programme.title: After getting stranded at Thriller Bark, Chopper, Nami, and Usopp are chased by a three headed beast. Back on the boat, Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hats are terrorized by an unseen enemy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ONE UNNATURAL PHENOMENON AFTER THE NEXT! DISEMBARKING ON THRILLER BARK!

programme.title: Chopper, Nami, and Usopp get scared out of their minds when they encounter a graveyard full of zombies! Meanwhile, the rest of the crew gets trapped in super creepy sea web!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE MAN CALLED A GENIUS! HOGBACK MAKES HIS APPEARANCE!

programme.title: An invisible man turns Nami's bath time into a harrowing experience, and Usopp battles a hall full of haunted paintings with a handful of burning candles!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: NAMI'S IN A MAJOR PINCH! THE ZOMBIE MANSION AND THE INVISIBLE MAN

programme.title: While Usopp, Nami, and Chopper seek to unravel the secrets of the haunted mansion, Luffy and the gang do battle with an army of the undead!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE ZOMBIE'S SECRET! HOGBACK'S NIGHTMARISH LABORATORY

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Mona Lisa never leaves the Louvre Museum. Arsne Lupin tried unsuccessfully to steal her and Lupin III wants her for his collection, however, and fireworks ignite between him and Zenigata in charge of security.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On New Years Eve, Lupin is after is the Golden Treasure Ship at Mount Horai. It's said that the Seven Lucky Gods conferred this treasure, which is shown in public only once a year when the New Year's bell rings at the belfry of Kohoji Temple.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: As usual, Lupin is tossed to and fro by Fujiko. But a man named Buckingham comes to him and sells him "disguise chewing gum" for 50,000 dollars.
programme.sub-title: The Strategy of the Chewing Gum Disguise

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The island of Rabaul has many remains of Japanese casualties of the Pacific War. It's said that Captain Cook's secret treasure is hidden there, worth 1-billion pounds. Lupin and gang are after this treasure but they get attacked!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and gang break into the Bank of Stockholm but as usual, Fujiko tries to take the money all for herself. Lupin goes after her but she gets injured in an avalanche. She confesses to Lupin about the location of her most precious treasure

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and friends search a month for the pirate Kid's treasure, but they are thwarted by an underground organization called the Red Ghost. Knowing something is afoot, Lupin sends Fujiko and Goemon to investigate.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin finds a piece of paper in a silk hat, an heirloom of Arsne Lupin. It's information regarding an opal statue of Venus, and since Lupin figures its ownership is his birthright, he heads to Gregoire's castle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Zenigata acquires a pie-throwing gun, and is ordered to capture Lupin. Meanwhile, Lupin and Fujiko are discussing Napoleon's treasures. It's said that the key to solving the mystery of their whereabouts lies in a scarf made by Napoleon's assistant
programme.sub-title: An Unusual End to an Expedition for Napoleon's Treasure

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The young girl Francoise lives near Lupin; she watches Lupin and Fujiko talking, and falls for him. But her father scolds her and tells her to stay away from thieves, but Francoise devises a plan to approach Lupin anyway

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Professor Pancho has devoted his life to solving the problem of food supply. Lupin decides to help them out and invents a rocket that flies on corn fuel, thinking that maybe he and Fujiko will take a trip to the moon

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is blackmailed; Fujiko has been kidnapped, and for ransom he must steal a jeweled crown worth 100 million dollars. Lupin and friends head to the museum where their objective lies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lady Black and Fujiko have a bet. Whoever kills Lupin will get the loser's entire jewelry collection. Lady Black lures Lupin using Fujiko so she could kill him, but why is she so passionate about wanting him dead?
programme.sub-title: Take Lupin All The Way to Hell

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Boss Largo wants Lupin dead; Lupin had just stolen a bundle of the boss's casino profits. But no run of the mill hitman would suffice to wack Lupin. But Largo sees that Lupin is suffering from a toothache, and gets an idea.
programme.sub-title: The Direct Attack! Dead Ball Strategy

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin reads the morning paper, which says that Lupin stole a 100-karat diamond that was being used in a musical. He knows he didn't do it, so he asks Fujiko and others, but they too have no idea what it's all about.
programme.sub-title: Lupin and An Old Woman's Scheme

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The nation of Janaica is troubled with coup d'etats and revolutions, but Lupin, discovering that the president's mansion houses the missing painting "Nude Venus," decides to go scope the joint with Jigen.
programme.sub-title: The Kindness Of Jigen is Seen

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The master of surrealism, Monsieur Dar had spent three years working on his masterpiece, but news is out that the great object of art got stolen.
programme.sub-title: Lupin vs The Man of Two Faces

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Three incidents of bank robbery have happened; a total of 1.3 billion yen was stolen. A man calling himself Goemon is the culprit and he even sends Lupin a challenge, but Goemon wants to settle the score by himself.
programme.sub-title: The Secret of Goemon's Zantetsu Sword

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin's stash of Napoleon's cash got stolen, but Lupin catches the culprit and tries to make him confess. Turns out he's only one of the followers of the Fandar cult, and heads to their holy land of Fandara.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin learns that a treasure trove lies in a volcano on Cleo Island, but it can only be reached when the mountain isn't spewing molten lava! He tries to convince Jigen and Goemon to join him but they're not interested.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko informs Lupin that fine quality diamonds from South Africa are stored in a safe of a global syndicate and importer of diamonds. Lupin makes his way as a worker in the boiler room, and steals the loot of diamonds.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin finds out about the jewel "Poison Trio" of the Borges family and decides to steal it after Fujiko goads him. Galdan, the nephew of Lucricia greets Lupin, and tells him that elderly Lucricia had been arrested and must be broken out of jail.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin goes on a safe-cracking rampage and rakes in 10 million francs. He needs the money to purchase the world's only rare Gold Butterfly at an auction. But Lupin drops the 10 million francs while on the run

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin scopes a jewelry museum where the billion-dollar gem Cleopatra's Tear is displayed. But Lupin can't get to it because the display case is secured by high-voltage electricity.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: No thief has ever succeeded in stealing the secret gem of Pompeii's nunnery; it's guarded by venomous snakes. Even Arsene Lupin gave up on it, since he hates snakes. But Lupin takes on the challenge. Will Lupin succeed? And what kind of secret gem is it?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Though the tycoon Steel had replaced all his bodily organs with artificial organs to live, he's told that he only has a week to live. There is only one way he could prolong his life, which is to receive a brain transplant and he wants Lupin's Brain.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Famous gourmand and field mice scientist Salmon Whitney is also known as being the chairman of a Canadian diamond mining operation. Lupin is after his diamonds, which will go on auction in Paris.
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Runs and the Pig Rolls

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Coaxed by Fujiko, Lupin decides to steal the diamond chandelier at the Kremlin Palace. He disguises himself as Zenigata and infiltrates the palace, but government police soldier Natasha captures him and throws him in the slammer.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: England's Lord Weather provokes Lupin with a bet, and dares him to steal Red Arrow away from him. Lupin takes the challenge as it's a matter of pride, but Jigen wants no part of it because he and Weather are gambling buddies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Miami Bank is on the verge of bankruptcy after its last customers closed their accounts. The bank manager Garlic devises a plan to revive the bank, and drums up news that his bank had been raided by Lupin; he also asks Lupin to really do it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Thief brothers Nanja-Monja have been in the business since the days of Arsne Lupin; they decide to induct Lupin as a tourist attraction for the Republic of Karchina. But first they abduct Fujiko.
programme.sub-title: Hair Breadth Rescue Operation for Fujiko

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko joins Lupin and gang who are camping and cooking Sukiyaki; people are hunting Fujiko, and gunfire is exchanged. Fujiko gets captured and Lupin's Sukiyaki meal gets ruined, but he finds an atomic bomb's detonator plug inside of the Sukiyaki bowl.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Genius prodigy boy Romanoff has ten doctorates from Russia's Public Academy; blustering that no greater than he exists, he challenges Lupin. Since Fujiko is involved, Lupin cannot back down; what will become of this challenge?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko is the model for Norway's famous sculptor Vingel's crystal mermaid statue; she believed when he said he would give it to her the day it was finished, but Vingel gets greedy and sells it to the mayor of the city of Bergen instead.
programme.sub-title: The Mermaid That Disappears in the Midnight Sun

programme.title: The Crow: Wicked Prayer, (2005, Thriller)
programme.desc: The fourth film in the dark superhero franchise is an epic new action tale. After an ex-con tries to straighten out his life, he and his girlfriend are brutally murdered by a renegade gang. A mysterious crow brings him back for revenge and redemption.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiance, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: The Crow: City of Angels, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: This fast-moving, action-packed sequel to THE CROW follows the rise of murder victim Ashe Corven, brought back to life by a mysterious crow. With the help of a woman named Sarah, he exacts revenge on his killers one by one.

programme.title: The Crow: Salvation, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: Alex Corvis returns to the world of the living to solve the murder of a young woman that he was wrongly accused of.

programme.title: The Crow: Wicked Prayer, (2005, Thriller)
programme.desc: The fourth film in the dark superhero franchise is an epic new action tale. After an ex-con tries to straighten out his life, he and his girlfriend are brutally murdered by a renegade gang. A mysterious crow brings him back for revenge and redemption.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiance, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: The Crow: City of Angels, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: This fast-moving, action-packed sequel to THE CROW follows the rise of murder victim Ashe Corven, brought back to life by a mysterious crow. With the help of a woman named Sarah, he exacts revenge on his killers one by one.

programme.title: The Crow: Salvation, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: Alex Corvis returns to the world of the living to solve the murder of a young woman that he was wrongly accused of.

programme.title: The Crow: Wicked Prayer, (2005, Thriller)
programme.desc: The fourth film in the dark superhero franchise is an epic new action tale. After an ex-con tries to straighten out his life, he and his girlfriend are brutally murdered by a renegade gang. A mysterious crow brings him back for revenge and redemption.

programme.title: Dakota, (1945, Western)
programme.desc: In 1871 Dakota, two crooked businessmen oppose the local wheat farmers and the railroad development, in order to control the town of Fargo.

programme.title: Johnny Guitar, (1954, Western)
programme.desc: Gambling house operator Vienna seeks control of a town as archrival Emma Small sets out to force Vienna out of town. The timely arrival of Johnny Guitar thwarts Emma's dark plans, but doesn't prevent a showdown between the women.

programme.title: In Old California, (1942, Western)
programme.desc: The Duke plays a young, ambitious pharmacist who moves into a brawling frontier town but locks horns with a local crime lord, bent on keeping the town for himself.

programme.title: Last Train From Gun Hill, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: Screen giants Kirk Douglas and Anthony Quinn star in this taut Western thriller directed by acclaimed filmmaker John Sturges (Gunfight at the O.K. Corral, The Great Escape).

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers, (1959, Action)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: King of the Cowboys, (1943, Action)
programme.desc: Saboteurs are blowing up government warehouses (during World War II). Roy and his pals work undercover to put an end to their operations.

programme.title: Cowboy and the Senorita, (1944, Western)
programme.desc: A worthless gold mine might in fact have hidden gold deposits. Leave it to Roy to find out the truth!

programme.title: San Fernando Valley, (1944, Western)
programme.desc: A ranch owner fires his ranch hands and brings in women to replace them. The owner's daughter wants the male hands back and comes up with a plan to do it. They will rustle the horses and bring the men in to get their old jobs back.

programme.title: Gunsight Ridge, (1957, Western)
programme.desc: Stage line agent investigates a series of robberies by taking the job of a deputy sheriff in a border Arizona town.

programme.title: The Rainmaker, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Katharine Hepburn garnered an Oscar nomination as the "plain yet magnetically beautiful" tomboy rancher, with Burt Lancaster brilliantly cast in the role of the smooth-talking con man.

programme.title: Penelope, (2008, Drama)
programme.desc: She's young, she's rich, she's available - too bad she has a pig's nose. Christina Ricci and James McAvoy team in a modern fairy tale about finding perfect love, imperfections and all.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven, (2005, Romance)
programme.desc: He's convinced she's a spirit. She's convinced she's still alive. As they search for the truth of Elizabeth's past, their relationship changes from resentment to romance.

programme.title: Legally Blonde, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Elle Woods has it all, but when her boyfriend goes to Harvard, Ellie rallies all her resources to get into Harvard Law. But law school is a far cry from the comforts of home. Elle must wage the battle of her life, for herself and for all blondes!

programme.title: Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Now a rising lawyer, Elle Woods is about to make partner at her firm, she and Emmett are still love, and her hair is still healthy. Elle heads to D.C. and take matters into her own hands.

programme.title: Serendipity, (2001, Romance)
programme.desc: In the course of one magical evening, Jonathan (John Cusack) and Sara (Kate Bekinsale) meet unexpectedly, but part ways, determining that fate will guide their future if they're meant to be together.

programme.title: The Heartbreak Kid, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ben Stiller stars as Eddie, the 40-year-old confirmed bachelor who finally says "I do" to the beautiful and Lila. But during their honeymoon, the woman of his dreams turns out to be a total nightmare.

programme.title: Win a Date with Tad Hamilton!, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: Rosalee, star-struck small-town girl, wins a date with the Hollywood hunk Tad Hamilton. And while it may be Rosalee's dream-come-true, it means complete chaos for her best friend Pete.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven, (2005, Romance)
programme.desc: He's convinced she's a spirit. She's convinced she's still alive. As they search for the truth of Elizabeth's past, their relationship changes from resentment to romance.

programme.title: Legally Blonde, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Elle Woods has it all, but when her boyfriend goes to Harvard, Ellie rallies all her resources to get into Harvard Law. But law school is a far cry from the comforts of home. Elle must wage the battle of her life, for herself and for all blondes!

programme.title: The savage group led by Alpha confronts the Hilltop in a harrowing attempt to retrieve her daughter; a supply run for the Kingdom turns into a dangerous quest.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: While one community struggles to ease tensions that threaten to divide from within, the true nature of another group comes into focus; a mission to rescue a friend has deadly consequences.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Daryl's daring rescue mission forces Alpha to unleash a group of her own to retrieve what belongs to her, even if the price is paid in blood; the Kingdom's plans to reunite the communities are put in jeopardy.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: An outsider's arrival forces Alexandria to rehash devastating old wounds; eye-opening secrets from the past are revealed.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The fair at the Kingdom is underway, with all four communities coming together in celebration for the first time in years; while some pacts are renewed, other deals will come at a much steeper price.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: In the aftermath of an overwhelming loss, the communities must brave a ferocious blizzard; as one group deals with an enemy from within, another is forced to make a life or death decision.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The group in Oceanside continues to train in case the Whisperers return; tensions are high as the heroes struggle to hold onto their concept of civilization.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: A flashback reveals the origins of Alpha and Beta; Alpha attempts to toughen up Lydia as they prepare to walk with the dead; the Whisperers create their herds.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead
programme.sub-title: We Are the End of the World

programme.title: The threat of the Whisperers return leads to paranoia sweeping over Alexandria; in the meantime, Carol battles with the need for revenge.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Still-paranoid Alexandrians get riled up over the Whisperers and take their fear out on Negan; at Hilltop, the group deals with an unexpected safety issue.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Supplies go missing from Hilltop; Negan is idolized by an Alexandrian; Ezekiel holds a secret.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Carol and Daryl go on a mission together while Siddiq struggles to solve a mystery.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Sobrenatural: Captulo 2
programme.desc: A sequncia arrapiante de Sobrenatural conta a histria da famlia assombrada Lambert, que procura descobrir o segredo de infncia misterioso que a deixou perigosamente ligada ao mundo dos espritos.

programme.title: Sobrenatural: A Origem
programme.desc: Elise Rainier concorda relutantemente em usar sua habilidade de contatar os mortos para ajudar uma adolescente que se tornou alvo de uma perigosa entidade sobrenatural.

programme.title: Sobrenatural: A ltima Chave
programme.desc: Neste quarto filme da franquia Sobrenatural, a doutora Elise Rainier (Lin Shaye) chamada para resolver o caso de uma assombrao no Novo Mxico, localizada justamente na casa em que ela passou a infncia.

programme.title: O Grito
programme.desc: Karen uma enfermeira americana que vive em Tquio e exposta a uma misteriosa maldio sobrenatural: um esprito vingativo que possui uma pessoa com uma raiva poderosa antes de reivindicar sua vida e se espalhar para outra vtima.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais 6
programme.desc: O Agente Especial Strahm est morto, e o Detetive Hoffman emergiu como sucessor indiscutvel do legado do Jigsaw. Porm, quando o FBI se aproxima de Hoffman, ele forado a iniciar o jogo, e o grande esquema do Jigsaw finalmente compreendido.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais 2
programme.desc: Jigsaw est de volta. O gnio brilhante e perturbado retorna para outra rodada de jogos mortais horripilantes.

programme.title: Batalha dos Zumbis
programme.desc: Alguns anos depois do caos econmico na Crocia, o mundo mudou e agora a gua rara e valiosa, e uma epidemia zumbi assola a Europa. O bon vivant Mico finalmente conhece sua estrela de cinema favorita, mas eles tero que lutar juntos para sobreviver.

programme.title: A Mmia Ressurge
programme.desc: Um grupo de estudantes de arqueologia desperta uma mmia antiga. Depois de ficarem presos em um loop temporal, a nica maneira de escaparem derrotar a mmia.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubaro de 6 Cabeas
programme.desc: O que deveria ser um acampamento de treinamento de casamento em uma ilha remota se transforma no teste final de sobrevivncia quando um tubaro de 6 cabeas comea a atacar a Praia.

programme.title: Apocalipse Zumbi
programme.desc: Meses depois que uma praga de zumbis exterminou 90% da populao americana, um pequeno grupo de sobreviventes abre caminho pelo pas em busca de um refgio na ilha de Catalina.

programme.title: Pegadas na neve
programme.desc: O perigo ronda uma montanha de neve. Cinco pessoas exploram uma regio nos alpes em busca de uma planta com propriedades medicinais.

programme.title: V/H/S
programme.desc: Um grupo de criminosos contratado para recuperar uma fita de vdeo. medida que eles buscam em pilhas de fitas VHS o vdeo certo, eles se deparam com um nmero aparentemente interminvel de vdeos assustadores, cada um mais estranho que o ltimo.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos
programme.desc: Enquanto o mundo tomado por zumbis, um grupo de cientistas e militares abrigados em um bunker subterrneo na Flrida devem determinar como devem lidar com a horda de mortos-vivos e com as diferenas entre os sobreviventes.

programme.title: O Homem da Mfia
programme.desc: Um assalto a um jogo de pquer ilegal, cujos participantes eram integrantes da mfia, abala o mundo do crime. Um matador profissional contratado para investigar o caso, mas a hesitao de alguns dos participantes coloca a situao fora de controle.

programme.title: Linha de Ao
programme.desc: O prefeito contrata um ex-policial para investigar quem o amante de sua esposa. Apesar de suas antigas discordncias, ele aceita a tarefa, mas logo descobre as reais intenes por trs da investigao encomendada.

programme.title: Alvo Duplo
programme.desc: Dois caras dures e pertencentes a lados opostos da lei vo unir foras para dar um ponto final em uma onda de assassinatos brutais, mas a tarefa no ser nada fcil e muito sangue vai rolar.

programme.title: Distrito 13 - Ultimato
programme.desc: Damien e Leito esto retornando ao Distrito 13 em uma misso para levar a paz ao setor controlado por cinco lderes de gangues diferentes, antes que os servios secretos da cidade tomem medidas drsticas para resolver o problema.

programme.title: Perigo em Bangkok
programme.desc: Joe um assassino que est na Tailndia para realizar quatro assassinatos sob encomenda. Os alvos so inimigos de Surat, um chefo do crime local. Para no ter que realizar o trabalho sozinho ele contrata Kong, um batedor de carteiras.

programme.title: Crimes Cruzados
programme.desc: As complicaes surgem durante uma situao perigosa de refm em um restaurante.

programme.title: Assassino Americano
programme.desc: O gngster americano Erik Vasquez est planejando se tornar o principal chefe do submundo mexicano, apenas para se ver fazendo inimigos tanto dos poderosos cartis quanto de seus prprios aliados.

programme.title: O Sequestro do nibus 657
programme.desc: Um pai no tem meios para pagar o tratamento mdico da filha. Como ltimo recurso, ele se une a um colega de trabalho ganancioso para roubar um cassino. Quando as coisas do errado, eles so forados a sequestrar um nibus da cidade.

programme.title: Fogo contra Fogo
programme.desc: Um bombeiro fora de servio testemunha um assassinato nas mos de uma gangue de gangsters. Ele entra no programa de proteo a testemunhas at depor, mas no pode se esconder por muito tempo da gangue, ento decide agir por conta prpria.

programme.title: Dose Dupla
programme.desc: Dois agentes especiais precisam se unir contra um cartel de drogas mexicano depois que uma operao secreta acaba gerando resultados catastrficos.

programme.title: Ruslan-Vingana Explosiva
programme.desc: Ruslan Drachev um ex-gangster que agora escreve romances criminais baseados em suas experincias. Ao visitar sua famlia ele descobre que sua filha est casando com o filho de um arqui-inimigo do mundo do crime.

programme.title: At o Fim!
programme.desc: O ex-soldado de Operaes Especiais Jake Hunter est desesperado para encontrar sua filha desaparecida. Enquanto Jake descobre a terrvel verdade em torno do desaparecimento dela, ele parte em uma busca impiedosa por vingana.

programme.title: Redeno
programme.desc: Jason Statham um veterano de guerra que assume uma nova identidade enquanto tenta se vingar dos assassinos de sua namorada grvida.

programme.title: O Corvo III: A Salvao
programme.desc: Alex Corvis um jovem injustamente condenado cadeira eltrica pelo brutal assassinato de Lauren, sua namorada. Pelo poder mgico do corvo, Corvis retorna do mundo dos mortos para vingar a morte de Lauren e limpar seu nome.

programme.title: Desejo de Vingana
programme.desc: Quando uma jornalista informada por um agente do FBI que seu marido acaba de ser assassinado, os dois unem foras para desvendar uma rede de enganos chocante e mortal.

programme.title: Agentes Duplos
programme.desc: Danny Gallagher, um desacreditado detetive da narcticos recm sado da priso, busca vingana da pessoa responsvel pela a acusao que o levou a ser preso e que matou seu parceiro.

programme.title: Vingana sem Limites
programme.desc: Quando Sandy, uma prostituta de luxo encontrada morta, seu protetor Jake fica inconformado e s pensa em vingana. Ele a amava, e agora ele no vai sossegar enquanto no encontrar seu assassino.

programme.title: Assassinatos em Boston
programme.desc: Matt Sorenson um ex-boxeador que tambm policial. Ele tenta elucidar a brutal morte de seu irmo mais novo, Michael, e para isto precisa se infiltrar em algo desconhecido para ele: a prtica do sadomasoquismo.

programme.title: Insanidade
programme.desc: Uma mulher vai para o campo para passar um fim de semana tranquilo depois de perder o emprego e ter seu ltimo relacionamento complicado chegando ao fim. Ela aluga uma casa de campo de um vivo, que luta para esconder suas tendncias homicidas.

programme.title: Inferno na Montanha
programme.desc: Um pai e um filho tentam salvar os habitantes de uma pequena cidade de um desastre natural e do colapso de um tnel recm-construdo.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubaro de 3 Cabeas
programme.desc: A maior mquina de matar do mundo trs vezes mais mortal quando um tubaro mutante ameaa um navio de cruzeiro. Os passageiros lutam contra o predador mortal usando tudo que podem encontrar.

programme.title: O ltimo Dia
programme.desc: Uma tempestade apocalptica ameaa devastar um pas inteiro. decretado estado de emergncia enquanto o caos estiver instaurado.

programme.title: Tubares de Gelo
programme.desc: Uma nova raa de tubares vorazes e agressivos racha o fundo do oceano congelado de uma estao de pesquisa do rtico, devorando todos os que caem.

programme.title: Grito Silencioso
programme.desc: Uma cidade inteira vtima de uma sanguinria criatura que caa humanos baseando-se em sons. Ser uma silenciosa batalha pela sobrevivnvia!

programme.title: Macaco Vs. Mquina
programme.desc: Reconhecendo o poder destrutivo de seu macaco gigante, os militares criam sua prpria Inteligncia Artificial pronta para a batalha, o Macaco Mecha, mas seu primeiro teste prtico d terrivelmente errado.

programme.title: Planeta dos Tubares
programme.desc: Em um futuro prximo, o derretimento glacial cobrir 98% da massa terrestre. Tubares floresceram e agora dominam o planeta, operando como uma enorme escola liderada por um tubaro alfa mutante.

programme.title: Um Plano Brilhante
programme.desc: Na Londres de 1960, um faxineiro convence uma executiva frustrada a planejar o roubo de diamantes na empresa onde trabalham. Chocada com a proposta do educado senhor, ela aceita, mas no demora muito para um investigador desconfie dela.

programme.title: Lute Por Sua Vida
programme.desc: Um filme focado em um grupo de pessoas obcecadas por um livro de autoajuda. medida que o livro se torna mais popular, ele afeta uma estranha variedade de personagens. Suas vidas se cruzam, gerando mudanas que duraro para sempre.

programme.title: Xeque-Mate
programme.desc: Um caso de identidade equivocada coloca Slevin no meio de uma guerra sendo tramada por dois dos chefes do crime mais rivais da cidade. Sob vigilncia constante do detetive Brikowski e do assassino Goodkat, ele deve peg-los antes que eles o peguem.

programme.title: Memria Artificial
programme.desc: Uma mulher que sofre de amnsia condenada morte sem se lembrar do crime que cometeu. O FBI oferece uma segunda chance se voc se submeter a um experimento: implante as memrias de fatalidades para resolver crimes.

programme.title: Assassino em Srie
programme.desc: Um psiclogo criminal e um especialista em impresses digitais trabalham juntos para rastrear um assassino em srie.

programme.title: Sem Lei
programme.desc: Um grupo de trs amigos planeja um grande roubo que acaba dando errado quando um deles se revela um traidor. Enganado, Sonny decide assumir o problema de frente e busca vingana contra o antigo parceiro.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A Retaliao
programme.desc: Kurt Sloan prometeu a si mesmo que no voltaria para a Tailndia, mas algum o seda e o fora a retornar ao pas asitico.

programme.title: Ip Man - O Mestre do Kung Fu
programme.desc: Durante o tempo em que foi capito da polcia na cidade de Foshan, Ip Man perseguido por um gngster vingativo, enquanto o exrcito japons invade a regio.

programme.title: Juiz Arqueiro
programme.desc: Um homem, que encarregado de resolver algumas discuptas entre academinas rivais de artes marciais fica dividido. Ele no sabe se escolhe cumprir o dever do que lhe foi delegado ou se vinga a horna de sua famlia.

programme.title: Co de briga
programme.desc: Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma mquina de matar, (Jet Li) campeo de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos.

programme.title: Mscara Negra
programme.desc: O sobrevivente de um projeto para criar super soldados deve lutar contra seus ex-companheiros como um heri mascarado.

programme.title: O Drago Invencvel
programme.desc: Um agente da polcia paisana procura vingana contra um sindicato do crime implacvel aps o assassinato do seu parceiro.

programme.title: A Promoo
programme.desc: Dois sub-gerentes de uma rede de supermercados disputam uma promoo cobiada.

programme.title: Stretch
programme.desc: Um motorista de limusine azarado luta para seguir em frente e pagar uma dvida com seu agenciador de apostas. Ele aceita um trabalho com um passageiro enlouquecido, cujo procurado livro implica alguns criminosos seriamente perigosos.

programme.title: Deus nos Acuda!
programme.desc: Entrega especial para fs de comdia! Greg Kinnear (Auto Focus) estrela este filme agradvel dirigido por Garry Marshall (Uma Linda Mulher) sobre um trapaceiro sem nenhum valor que passa a se dar bem.

programme.title: Um Homem Chamado Ove
programme.desc: Com duas indicao ao Oscar. Ove, um velho aposentado, vivo e mal-humorado leva uma vida isolada e amargurada. Mas justo quando ele desiste de viver, novos vizinhos se mudam para a casa da frente e surge uma amizade inesperada.

programme.title: As Testemunhas de Madea
programme.desc: Um banqueiro de investimento de Wall Street, que foi incriminado como pea-chave do esquema Ponzi, apoiado por sua empresa, transferido com sua famlia para a casa do sul de tia Madea.

programme.title: Alex & Emma - Escrevendo sua Histria de Amor
programme.desc: Um autor endividado e sem inspirao precisa terminar um livro para pagar uma dvida com um mafioso. Ento, ele contrata uma tipgrafa para ajudar, mas eles acabam se apaixonando e isso pode colocar tudo a perder.

programme.title: Sexo & Mentiras
programme.desc: Uma explorao a intimidade na vida de dois casais e revela o que necessrio para alcanar uma unio de longo prazo, mantendo um relacionamento sexual saudvel e satisfatrio.

programme.title: Sobre o Amor. Somente Para Adultos
programme.desc: O filme se passa em Moscou no vero. Pessoas que tm pressa em seus negcios importantes e tambm no se esquecem da aquisio de novos conhecimentos e habilidades.

programme.title: De Cabelos em P
programme.desc: Quando o Campeonato Nacional de Cabeleireiros chega a uma pequena cidade de Yorkshire, ningum est preparado para o glamour, as intrigas e as trapaas que chegam junto para atrapalham as vidas dos moradores. S que um habitante, ganhar destaque.

programme.title: Como Treinar o Seu Marido
programme.desc: Uma terapeuta matrimonial tenta consertar seu prprio casamento concentrando-se em como mudar seu marido.

programme.title: Sobrou Pra Voc
programme.desc: Abbie e Robert so amigos com muita coisa em comum: jovens, tm uma viso no-convencional da vida, inteligentes, impulsivos e um terrvel azar no amor. Eles fariam um par perfeito, se no houvesse um problema: Robert gay.

programme.title: Vicky Cristina Barcelona
programme.desc: Durante suas frias de vero na Espanha, duas amigas se apaixonam pelo mesmo pintor, sem saber que sua ex-esposa, com quem ela tem um relacionamento tumultuado, est prestes a entrar em cena novamente.

programme.title: A Vida em Si
programme.desc: O relacionamento amoroso vivido por um casal (Oscar Isaac e Olivia Wilde), contado atravs de diferentes dcadas e continentes, desde as ruas de Nova York at Espanha e como diferentes pessoas acabam se conectando a ela atravs de um evento marcante.

programme.title: A Garota dos Meus Sonhos
programme.desc: A vigarista Rosalyn Willoughby, em Hollywood, e o artista de rua Fletcher McBracken, em San Antonio, tm o mesmo sonho, que os liga um ao outro. Ele viaja para Los Angeles para encontr-la, mas a princpio ela resiste.

programme.title: Paixes Paralelas
programme.desc: Fantasia e realidade se tornam indistinguveis para uma mulher que conduz sua vida dupla em seus sonhos. Marie uma linda e solitria viva americana, que vive com suas duas filhas no sul da Frana, onde cria uma existncia imaginria em seus sonhos..

programme.title: Ice - Quando o Amor Transforma
programme.desc: Nadya desiste do sonho de ser campe de patinao aps um acidente. Mas Sasha, jogador de hquei, a inspira a acreditar e perseguir seu sonho novamente.

programme.title: Um Encontro Com o Destino
programme.desc: Depois de saber que ela foi incumbida de cuidar dos filhos de seu primo falecido, um arquiteto fica dividido entre se concentrar em sua carreira e honrar o desejo de seu primo.

programme.title: Linha de Ao
programme.desc: O prefeito contrata um ex-policial para investigar quem o amante de sua esposa. Apesar de suas antigas discordncias, ele aceita a tarefa, mas logo descobre as reais intenes por trs da investigao encomendada.

programme.title: As Duas Faces de um Crime
programme.desc: Um suspense de tribunal sobre um famoso advogado (Richard Gere) que assume o caso aparentemente impossvel de um coroinha (Edward Norton) acusado de matar um padre catlico.

programme.title: A Filha do General
programme.desc: Dois investigadores do Exrcito revelam um escndalo multilateral quando provam o assassinato brutal de um oficial.

programme.title: Jogos Psicolgicos
programme.desc: Um casal apaixonado passa um tempo longe da civilizao, mas as chegadas repentinas da irm mais nova e depois do exnamorado da garota violam o idlio campestre.

programme.title: Amor, Sexo & Pandemia
programme.desc: Uma viso sobre a epidemia e a solido em que vivemos. O fato de termos acesso cada vez mais fcil ao sexo sem sexo, temos um problema crescente em construir uma relao de proximidade e amor com outro ser humano.

programme.title: Terra Bruta
programme.desc: Pela primeira vez, o lendrio John Ford une-se estrela James Stewart em - Terra Bruta, que relata a histria tensa e emocionante de dois homens da lei que invadem o territrio dos Comanches para resgatar refns cativos da tribo.

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S5E7
